verbose_text: Phosphorylation of NF-kappaB and signal transducers and activators of transcription (STAT) proteins STAT1 and STAT3 was studied in 13 newly diagnosed patients (age 3-11 years) and in age-, sex-, and HLA genotype matched siblings of unrelated T1D patients both with beta-cell autoimmunity (at least two autoantibodies, n = 13) and without signs of autoimmunity (n = 13).
